doc.field: FIFA Club World Cup 2025 Full squad list of all teams and players
FIFA Club World Cup 2025 Full squad list of all teams and players

end of list The 32 teams have now announced their full squads for the new-look monthlong expanded intercontinental club competition. Here is the confirmed squad list of all the teams in a tournament which features mega clubs Real Madrid Boca Juniors Inter Milan PSG Bayern Munich Chelsea and Flamengo FIFA Club World Cup 2025
